info.description: RESTful API for healthcare market research reports and categories with caching and pagination support
info.title: Healthcare Market Research API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Generate new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get a paginated list of authors with optional search

parameters.description: Search in name, role, and bio
parameters.name: search

200.description: List of authors with pagination metadata

post.description: Create a new author. Requires admin or editor role.

parameters.description: Author data (name is required with min 2 chars, role and bio are optional)
parameters.name: author

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

403.description: Forbidden - requires admin or editor role

get.description: Get a single author by ID

put.description: Update an existing author by ID. Supports partial updates. Requires admin or editor role.

parameters.description: Updated author data (all fields are optional for partial updates)
parameters.name: author

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation error

403.description: Forbidden - requires admin or editor role

delete.description: Delete an author by ID. Cannot delete if author is referenced in any reports. Requires admin role.

400.description: Bad request - invalid ID or author is referenced in reports

get.description: Get a paginated list of all active healthcare report categories

200.description: List of categories with pagination metadata

get.description: Get a single healthcare report category by its unique slug
Get a paginated list of reports belonging to a specific category

200.description: List of reports in category with pagination metadata

400.description: Bad request - category slug is required

get.description: Get a paginated list of healthcare market research reports with optional filters for status, category, geography, and search. Admin users can use additional filters for user tracking and date ranges. Admin-only fields are automatically included in responses for authenticated admin/editor users.
get.summary: Get all reports with optional filters

parameters.description: Search in title, summary, and description
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by creator user ID
parameters.name: created_by

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by last updater user ID
parameters.name: updated_by

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by created date (ISO 8601, e.g., 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z)
parameters.name: created_after

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by created date (ISO 8601)
parameters.name: created_before

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by updated date (ISO 8601)
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by updated date (ISO 8601)
parameters.name: updated_before

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by published date (ISO 8601)
parameters.name: published_after

parameters.description: Admin only: Filter by published date (ISO 8601)
parameters.name: published_before

200.description: List of reports with pagination metadata. Admin fields (created_by, updated_by, internal_notes) are included only for authenticated admin/editor users.

post.description: Create a new healthcare market research report. Automatically sets created_by and updated_by to the authenticated user. Requires admin or editor role.

201.description: Created report with auto-populated admin tracking fields

403.description: Forbidden - requires admin or editor role

put.description: Update an existing healthcare market research report by ID. Automatically updates updated_by field. Creates version history when status changes to 'published'. Requires admin or editor role.

200.description: Updated report with auto-updated admin tracking fields

403.description: Forbidden - requires admin or editor role

delete.description: Delete a healthcare market research report by ID. Permanently removes the report and all associated data. Requires admin role.

get.description: Get a single healthcare market research report by its unique slug or numeric ID. If the parameter is numeric, it will be treated as an ID; otherwise, it will be treated as a slug.
get.summary: Get report by slug or ID

400.description: Bad request - slug or ID is required

get.description: Search for healthcare market research reports by query text (searches in title, description, and summary)

400.description: Bad request - search query is required

get.description: Get all users with pagination (admin only)
Get the currently authenticated user's information
Check if the API is running and healthy

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: Operations related to healthcare market research reports
tags.name: Reports

tags.description: Operations related to report categories and hierarchies
tags.name: Categories

tags.description: Operations related to report authors and analysts
tags.name: Authors
